Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When participants were stratified by antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) use , the association between alcohol and CD4 + T - cell did not reach statistical significance .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Antiretroviral therapy (ART) |

In this paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "antiretroviral therapy (ART)". It is important to note that ART is not a single chemical compound, but rather a class of drugs used to treat HIV/AIDS.
